author: apatel
msg: After form is posted in background we should not update the form area. This causes problem if form area has embedded <script> block.
Removed this requirement. Instead now we reset form after update. Now I think we need to check for errors before reseting the form. This will help user to modify data and resubmit. I'll do that next.

author: apatel
msg: Removed Prototype.js specific code from HtmlFormRenderer.

make _call accurate - even if not thread safe
